module.name: land
module.keywords: module, land, interconnect, electrical, electronic, substrate, pad, terminal, termination, mechanical support

abstract.li: substrate features designed to accept component terminals;
functional specification of substrate features designed to accept component terminals;
substrate features designed to mechanically support plated passages;
functional specification of substrate features designed to mechanically support plated passages.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information required to partially specify certain interconnect substrate features. These items are defined to support attachments for mating components in the electronic assembly. The items are not necessarily themselves visually distinguishable in the material in the interconnect substrate.

inscope.li: substrate features designed to accept component terminals;
functional specification of substrate features designed to accept component terminals;
substrate features designed to mechanically support plated passages;
functional specification of substrate features designed to mechanically support plated passages;
items within the scope of application module Layered interconnect module design, ISO/TS 10303-1698.

sc.description: All members of this constraint maps to entity with additional constraints in the mapping. All of them require UNIQUE string for ., so ONEOF subtype constraint from ARM is guaranteed as not violated.
